1.TITLE: Username not exist
BODY: This user not exist in Crea Network

ERROR.DENIED_TERMS: You must read and accept the terms and conditions
ERROR.DENIED_POLICY: You must read and accept the privacy policy

INSUFFICIENT_RC.TITLE: Your operation could not be processed. Insufficient FLOW.
BODY: This happens when your user account runs out of sufficient FLOW.

The FLOW is a non-transferable type of resource or token that is granted intelligently by the CREA blockchain to each @user account according to the amount of CREA Energy (CGY) it has. The FLOW is proportional to the CGY.
The FLOW is a resource that is consumed every time a user makes transactions (votes, likes, comments, transfers or energizations).
Each transaction has a specific cost in FLOW. If you have enough FLOW to cover the cost, you can make the transaction.
This system allows in a decentralized way to protect the blockchain from malicious actions such as spam.
What can I do if I run out of FLOW?
When a user runs out of FLOW, he can do two things:
1. Wait for it to recharge again. Each day 22% will be refilled, therefore to have 100% FLOW you will need 5 days.
2. The fastest option to increase your FLOW is to buy more CREA and Energize it. Following this link https://creaproject.io/buy/ you can access different services that sell or exchange CREA.

PERMLINK_ALREADY_EXISTS.TITLE: Invalid title or Permlink
BODY: It has been detected that you already have a post with the same permlink as this one. This happens when the title you intend to use is very similar to an existing one and generates the same link.
If you are trying to make an edit, please use the "Edit Post" button that you will find on the post page.

ACCOUNT_UPDATE_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED.TITLE: Account update
ACCOUNT_UPDATE_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED.BODY: The account can not be updated more than once in less than 1 hour. Last time: %s.

ERROR.INVALID_PHONE: Phone is invalid. Please check and sure that phone number includes the country prefix
ERROR.SMS_REQUEST_LIMIT: Wait at least 30 min from the last code request to be able to make a new one with this phone number.

SIGN_IN.CHECK_EMAIL_TEXT: We have sent an email with a confirmation link to your email address. Please click the confirmation link.
SIGN_IN.CONGRATULATIONS_TITLE: Congratulations, now you are part of the Creary community!
SIGN_IN.IMPORTANT: If you ever lose your password, your account will be lost and you will not be able to access your content or your tokens. We don’t know your password, and we will not be able to help you recover it.
SIGN_IN.CONGRATULATIONS_TEXT: You are ready to start traveling in the Creary universe. \nPublish your creations and start earning your first cryptocurrencies.
SIGN_IN.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_TERMS: I agree to Creary’s terms and conditions
SIGN_IN.DISCOVER_TEXT: Creary is the decentralized creative community connected to the blockchain of Crea. We are not a conventional social network controlled by a centralized entity. \nThe blockchain of Crea is supported transversally by the members of our community around the world. \nTo create an account in Creary, a micro fee is charged to avoid the massive registration of bots or malicious accounts. Creary will cover this rate, we will only need your email in order to verify that you are a real person.
SIGN_IN.STARTED_SECONDARY_SENTENCE: Great! Username available on our network.
SIGN_IN.ENTER_EMAIL_TEXT: Use a valid email to continue with the registration process
SIGN_IN.PASSWORD_TEXT: Keep your password in a safe place.
SIGN_IN.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_TEXT: Please, add your password again to make sure it has been copied correctly. Remember to make sure you have stored your password in a safe place. \nWe recommend that you store copies of your password in different places both online or offline, such as a flash drive, a printed paper or in your preferred password manager.
SIGN_IN.STARTED_TEXT: Your username will be visible and it is what identifies your account on Creary and other Creary-based apps.
SIGN_IN.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_PRIVACY: I agree to Creary’s privacy policy

PUBLICATION.BLOCK_USER: Block all posts by this user

PUBLICATION.MODAL_DOWNLOAD_TEXT: To make the download you must pay the following amount to the author.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_DOWNLOAD_TEXT_PAYED: You have already downloaded this content before, you can download it again at no cost.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_HEAD1: Report content helps improve the quality of the platform.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_HEAD2: The most common reasons to report content are:
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_REASON3: Offensive material that incites hatred and violence.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_REASON4: Project using tag spam (irrelevant tags) or containing spam.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_FOOTER: Remember that reporting content can influence the visibility and the rewards achieved by the publication. It depends on you to consider these most common cases to report content.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_COMMENT_HEAD1: Reporting comments helps improve the quality of the platform.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_COMMENT_HEAD2: The most common reasons for reporting comments are:
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_COMMENT_REASON2: Comment offensive or inciting hatred and violence.
PUBLICATION.MODAL_REPORT_COMMENT_FOOTER: Remember that reporting content can influence the visibility and rewards achieved by that comment. It's up to you to consider these most common cases to report comments.
PUBLICATION.BLOCKED_USER_ALERT_MESSAGE:
This user has been reported by many well reputed users of our community. There are different reasons to report users:
                                Identity supplantation, copyright infringement, spam, fraud or other behaviors considered malicious or negatives for the community.

WELCOME.SLIDE1_TEXT1:
Creary is the decentralized creative community connected to the blockchain of Crea. We are not a 
conventional social network controlled by a centralized entity.
WELCOME.SLIDE1_TEXT2: The blockchain of Crea is supported transversally by the members of the community around the world.
WELCOME.SLIDE1_TEXT3:
In order to create an account in Creary, a micro fee is charged to avoid the massive registration 
of bots or malicious accounts. With great pleasure Creary will cover this rate, we will only need your email 
in order to verify that you are a real person.
WELCOME.SLIDE2_TEXT1:
Your username will be public and it is how you will be known in the community of Creary and in 
other applications based on Crea.
WELCOME.SLIDE2_INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: Type a name for your user
WELCOME.SLIDE3_TEXT1: Enter a valid email to continue with the validation process
WELCOME.SLIDE4_TEXT1: Check your email and click on the email validation link.
WELCOME.SLIDE5_TEXT1: Your email has been verified correctly.
WELCOME.SLIDE6_TEXT1: Please, confirm your phone. We will only use your phone number to confirm your account. We will not deliver this information to anyone. When entering your phone number an SMS will be sent with a confirmation code that you must enter in the next step.
WELCOME.SLIDE6_SELECT_COUNTRY: Type your country and select your phone prefix
WELCOME.SLIDE7_TEXT1: Keep your password in a safe place. IMPORTANTE: If you ever lose your password, your account will be irretrievably lost and you will not be able to access your content or your tokens. We do not have your password, and we can not help you recover it.
WELCOME.SLIDE8_TEXT1:
Add the password again to make sure it has been copied correctly. Make sure you have stored your 
password in a safe place.
WELCOME.SLIDE8_TEXT2:
We recommend that you keep copies of your password in different media such as a flash drive, a 
printed paper or in your preferred key manager.
WELCOME.SLIDE8_CHECKBOX1: I agree to the terms and conditions of the Creary service
WELCOME.SLIDE8_CHECKBOX2: I agree with the Creary privacy policy
WELCOME.SLIDE9_TITLE: Congratulations and you are part of the Crea community!
WELCOME.SLIDE9_TEXT1:
Now you are ready to start traveling in the universe of Creary. Publish your creations and start 
earning your first cryptocurrencies.

CHANGE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Change password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.SUBTITLE: REMEMBER:
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RADIO_INPUT_SAFELY: I have safely stored my new password.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RADIO_INPUT_UNDERSTAND: I understand that Creary can’t recover lost passwords.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.ERROR_CONDITIONS: Check the conditions to change the password.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RULE_1: If you ever lose your password, your account will be irretrievably lost and you will not be able to access its content or its tokens.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RULE_2: We do not save your password, and we can not help you recover it.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RULE_3: If you add a new password that you can memorize, this is not a secure password.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RULE_4: Use passwords created in a random way, against more characters of length have more secure will be.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RULE_5: Do not tell anyone your Creary password.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.RULE_6: Always make some backup of your password.

PUBLISH.INFO_SUBTITLE: Select or drag a featured image for the cover of your post.

PUBLISH.QUESTION: Does this project contain adult content?

PUBLISH.DOWNLOAD_SUBTITLE: Select a file and set the price you want for its download.

PUBLISH.LICENSE_SUBTITLE: Choose the most suitable type of license for your publication.
PUBLISH.LICENSE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN: Do you want your work to be in the public domain?
PUBLISH.LICENSE_ADAPTATIONS: Do you want to allow the adaptations of your work to be shared?
PUBLISH.LICENSE_COMMERCIAL: Do you want to allow commercial uses of your work?
PUBLISH.LICENSE_SHARE: Yes, as long as they are shared in the same way
PUBLISH.LICENSE_NO_LICENSE: No license. (no one is allowed to use your work without your permission).
PUBLISH.LICENSE_TEXT_PUBLISH: You are about to publish your project. Let’s go!
PUBLISH.LICENSE_TEXT_INMUTABLE: The content of your project is immutable. It can be re-edited but not deleted from the blockchain.
PUBLISH.NO_ELEMENTS_ERROR: You must add at least one element (image, audio, video or text)
PUBLISH.FILE_FORMAT_NOT_ALLOWED: This file format is not allowed
PUBLISH.NO_TITLE_TAG_OR_IMAGE: You must add a featured image, a title and at least one tag
PUBLISH.RELOAD_DOWNLOAD_FILE: It's necessary to reload the download file: %s
PUBLISH.PUBLISH_NOT_AVAILABLE_SUBTITLE: The publications are currently under maintenance. You will can publish your works again very soon.

WALLET.BALANCES_SAVING_TEXT: Balances subject to 3 day withdraw waiting period.
WALLET.PERMISSIONS_TEXT_MEMO: The memo key is used to create and read memos (memorizable addresses).
WALLET.CONVERT_CGY_TEXT:
These tokens give you influence in the community. The level of influence of your votes will depend on the accumulated CREA ENERGY. 

CREA ENERGY is non-transferable and requires 2 months (8 payments) to convert back to CREA.
WALLET.DE_ENERGIZE_TEXT: You are De-Energizing %s (%s paid out so far). Remember that if you change the amount to “De-Energize” the payout schedule will reset.
WALLET.SAVINGS_WITHDRAWAL_TEXT: You have %s running request from savings withdrawals.
WALLET.BALANCES_CGY_TEXT: They are the tokens that give you influence in the community. The level of influence of your votes will depend on the accumulated CREA ENERGY.
WALLET.UPDATE_TEXT: Update your wallet from platform 1.0 to the web version 2.0
WALLET.BALANCES_CBD_TEXT: Tradeable tokens that can be transferred anytime.
WALLET.DE_ENERGIZE_ALERT_TEXT: It is recommended to leave at least 5 CREA ENERGY in your wallet, otherwise your account may become unusable.
WALLET.UPDATE_SECONDARY_SENTENCE: Insert the password of your wallet
WALLET.PERMISSIONS_TEXT_ACTIVE: The active key is used to make transfers and place buy and sell orders in the CREA/CBD internal market.
WALLET.TRANSFER_CREA_TEXT: Move funds to another CREA account.
WALLET.TRANSFER_TO_SAVINGS_TEXT: Protect your funds by requesting withdrawal with a period of 3 days of waiting
WALLET.TRANSFER_FROM_SAVINGS_TEXT: The withdrawal has a period of 3 days of waiting.
WALLET.TRANSFER_FROM_SAVINGS_EXCHANGE_TEXT: We don't recommend sending balance to an exchange from the savings section. Use the transfer function.
WALLET.TRANSFER_CBD_TEXT: Move funds to another CBD account.
WALLET.WITHDRAW_SAVING_TEXT: Withdraw funds. A 3 day waiting period is required.
WALLET.PERMISSIONS_TEXT_POSTING: With the posting key users can vote and post contens. It should be different from the active and owner keys.
WALLET.PERMISSIONS_TEXT_OWNER:
The owner key is the master key for your account and is required to change the rest of keys.
The private key (password) for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible in a safe place.
WALLET.WITHDRAW_CBD_TEXT: Withdraw funds. A 3 day waiting period is required.
WALLET.BALANCES_CREA_TEXT: Tokens that work as a liquid asset (easily convertible to cash); they can be transferred to other users and can be converted into CREA ENERGY in a process known as “Energize”.
WALLET.BALANCES_DELEGATED_CGY_TEXT: It is your delegated CREA Energy by other users. You can benefit from the advantadges of these CGY but you can't deenergize it, as it belongs to the original owner.
WALLET.BALANCES_ACCOUNT_TEXT: It is an estimated value based on the value of CREA in US Dollars.
WALLET.DE_ENERGIZE_UNUSABLE_ACCOUNT: It is not recommended to leave less than 5 CREA ENERGY in your account, because you can leave your account in an unusable state.
WALLET.WITHDRAW_TEXT: Withdraw funds. A 3 day waiting period is required.

ACCOUNT_RECOVERY.TITLE: Account Recovery
ACCOUNT_RECOVERY.DESCRIPTION_1: If someone manages to hack your account by accessing the place where you saved your password, he could change it and prevent access to the original owner of the account.
ACCOUNT_RECOVERY.DESCRIPTION_2: The blockchain of Crea incorporates a system for recovering stolen accounts. If your password has been changed without your consent, then the account designated as your recovery account can generate a new owner key for the account.
ACCOUNT_RECOVERY.DESCRIPTION_3: This recovery process must be completed within 30 days after the password is modified, and the user must provide a recent owner key that has been valid in the last 30 days.
ACCOUNT_RECOVERY.DESCRIPTION_4: This functionality can only be used in creary.net as long as the owner of the account has included Creary as his trusted account and has also accepted the terms and conditions of service of Creary.net.
